title: Ruzgar Hotel Alacati Restaurant
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Raw, Buffet, Mediterranean, Salad bar, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Bakery, Aegean, Tapas
description: A vegetarian restaurant located inside the hotel/B&B. Uses organic products from surrounding villages in the creative Southern Aegean up to Istanbul cuisine. Backyard dining, as well as inside. Has vegan options.
streetAddress: Alacati Mahallesi Hacimemis Mevkii 12010 Sok Cexme
